column4: hello, i kinda need some help with my internet. I am using a usb dongle for internet and am using my drivers from windows via ndswrapper. I seem to browse and surf on firefox fine, but updating and adding/removing programs is either really slow or kinda "hiccups" speed.
did you select the best server for the downloads or just use the default?
do you know how to choose the fastest one for your connection?
